body_html:
The root problem seems to be that a team has updated the list of web resources in their profile with a direct link to their blog post on rgsoc.org. Our feed url detection does the rest:

require 'feed'
source = Source.new(url: "https://railsgirlssummerofcode.org/blog/2017-08-07-two-geeks-and-a-summer-of-code")
feed = Feed.new(source)
feed.send(:discover_feed_url)
# => "http://railsgirlssummerofcode.org/blog.xml"

body:
The root problem seems to be that a team has updated the list of web resources in their profile with a direct link to their blog post on rgsoc.org. Our feed url detection does the rest:

```ruby
require 'feed'
source = Source.new(url: "https://railsgirlssummerofcode.org/blog/2017-08-07-two-geeks-and-a-summer-of-code")
feed = Feed.new(source)
feed.send(:discover_feed_url)
# => "http://railsgirlssummerofcode.org/blog.xml"
```
